name: Lycanthrope, Werecrocodile
damage_immunities: nonmagic bludgeoning, piercing, and slashing attacks not made with silvered weapons

actions.name: Multiattack (Humanoid or Hybrid Form Only)
actions.desc: Two Tail Swipe or Khopesh attacks or it makes one Bite and one Tail Swipe.

actions.name: Bite (Crocodile or Hybrid Form Only)
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack: +4 to hit, 5 ft., one target, 7 (1d10+2) piercing damage and target is grappled (escape DC 12). Until the grapple ends the target is restrained and werecrocodile can't bite another. If target is a Humanoid it must make DC 12 Con save or be cursed with werecrocodile lycanthropy.

actions.name: Tail Swipe (Crocodile or Hybrid Form Only)
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack: +4 to hit 5 ft. 1 tgt not grappled by werecrocodile. 7 (2d4+2) bludgeoning damage and target knocked prone (DC 12 Str negates prone).

actions.name: Khopesh (Humanoid Form Only)
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack: +4 to hit, 5 ft., one target, 6 (1d8+2) slashing damage or 7 (1d10+2) slashing damage if used with two hands.

special_abilities.name: Hold Breath (Crocodile or Hybrid Form Only)
special_abilities.desc: Can hold its breath for 15 min.
